summary: An ordinance relating to and providing for the improvement of Halleck Avenue Southwest, from 53rd Avenue Southwest to Bonair Drive; and certain parts of certain other streets and avenues ,all in accordance with Resolution No. 7657 of the City Council of the City of Seattle, creating a local improving district therefor, and providing for that payment for said improvement to be made by special assessment upon property in said district payable by the mode of "Payment in Bonds."
